articles.title: 90th Anniversary of DIU, Historic Root of WPK
articles.content:
90th Anniversary of DIU, Historic Root of WPK
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Ninety years has passed since the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU), the historic root of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 On October 17, Juche 15 (1926), President Kim Il Sung formed the DIU, the vanguard organization of new type, to open up a new path for the Korean revolution.
					
					 The formation of the DIU served as a starting point and historic root for building a Juche-type revolutionary party. And its members played a key role in founding the party in Korea.
					
					 The DIU's programme and principle of independence became the guidelines for the building of the WPK and its activities, and its spirit of anti-imperialist struggle served as the foundation of the WPK's Songun (military-first) politics.
					
					 The history of the Korean revolution that originated from the DIU is an immortal history of victory in which the precious traditions have been established to go down forever.
					
					 With the noble idea of the DIU, the Korean people could successfully carry out the building of new Korea after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule and lead the three-year Fatherland Liberation War, the postwar rehabilitation, the two-stage social revolution and the socialist construction to victory.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had given steady continuity to the traditions of the DIU, modeling the party and the revolutionary ranks on the monolithic idea based on the Juche idea, the Songun idea and turning the DPRK into a power in political, ideological and military aspects while always winning victories in the confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 Today the WPK has further strengthened into the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun started with the formation of the DIU, will surely emerge victorious under the guidance of the WPK.

articles.title: Message of Condolence to Thai PM
articles.content:
Message of Condolence to Thai PM
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Saturday sent a message of condolence to Prayuth Chanocha, prime minister of Thailand, on the demise of King Bhumibol Adulyadej.
					 Expressing profound condolences and sympathy to the bereaved family and the government and people of Thailand, the message said that the demise of the king is a great loss to the government and people of Thailand.
					
					 It noted that though the king passed away, the exploits he performed for the development and prosperity of the country will always be remembered by the people of Thailand.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho also sent a similar message to his Thai counterpart Don Pramudwinai on the same day.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Diplomats to DPRK Held
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Diplomats to DPRK Held
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A sports contest among members of the Diplomatic Corps in the DPRK took place at the Rungna People's Sports Park here on October 11-16 for the fourth time.
					 In the contest divided into five teams, competitions were made in such events as volleyball, basketball and football.
					
					 The volleyball and basketball titles were taken by the Mongolian embassy team.
					
					 Present to watch the final football match on Sunday were Kung Sok Ung, former vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other honorary guests, officials concerned, representatives of foreign embassies and international bodies to the DPRK, family members of embassy officials and sports fans.
					
					 In the football match, the Russian embassy team beat the team comprising of embassies of Asian, African and Latin American countries.
					
					 Then followed diverse amusement games, divided into Hong (red) and Chong (blue) teams.
					
					 Prizes were awarded to the successful teams and individuals.
					
					 There was also a show of national dishes prepared by families of foreign diplomats.
					
					 The sports contest marked an important occasion in further deepening friendship.

articles.title: Anniversary of Women's Brass Band of KPISF Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Women's Brass Band of KPISF Marked
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Women's Brass Band of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF) marked its 20th founding anniversary.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il founded the brass band on October 17, Juche 85 (1996) and guided four concerts and gave more than a hundred of teachings, indicating all issues arising in the activities of the brass band ranging from its mission and duty to the principle of creation, methods of rendition and the issues of selecting conductors and players and training reserves.
					
					 Over the past two decades since its founding, the brass band has been strengthened into the militant art organization fully demonstrating the might of the revolutionary military music through Korean-style genuine and dynamic brass playing under the guidance of the Party and the leader, and recorded its proud history.
					
					 A meeting marking the anniversary took place on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), officials concerned and officials, creators, artistes and employees of the brass band.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the C.C., the WPK to the creators and artistes of the Women's Brass Band of the KPISF was conveyed at the meeting.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Equatorial Guinean Party Leader
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on Oct. 7.
					 The general secretary in the message said that at this moment marking the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) all the members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and its supporters extended the warmest and heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the WPK and all the Korean people on behalf of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 The message extended once again sincere greetings to Kim Jong Un on this opportunity grandly celebrating the significant day when the great party of the Korean people was founded.

articles.title: Ugandan Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Ugandan Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A Ugandan delegation for the study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism headed by Odauk Paul Michael, deputy commissioner of the National Secretariat for Patriotism Clubs Office of the President, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President and his family members.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Arch of Triumph, Pyongyang Orphans' Secondary School, the Central Zoo, etc.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net led by Vice-Chairman Yudaka Tsunogai Sunday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 The guests laid a bunch of flowers before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Fixtures Transported to Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
Fixtures Transported to Flood-hit Areas
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The first train carrying fixtures left Jagang Province of the DPRK to the flood-hit areas in the northern part of the country.
					Various units in the province turned out more than 14,000 quality fixtures for the disaster areas in a short period.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Railway Science of DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Railway Science of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Branch Academy of Railway Science of the DPRK have made technical achievements conducive to improving the country's railways, including those railways in flood-hit North Hamgyong Province.
					 They established a new curved concrete sleeper production process and developed a device for fixing sleeper.
					
					 They also settled the technical problem for curing the concrete sleeper at low temperature and developed an information input terminal.

articles.title: Int'l Seminar Supports Just Cause of Korean People
articles.content:
Int'l Seminar Supports Just Cause of Korean People
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The 11th international seminar on the struggle against neo-liberalism took place in Rio de Janeiro of Brazil recently under the sponsorship of the Marxist-Leninist Communist Party of Brazil.
					 Present there were representatives of the parliament, political parties and organizations of Brazil.
					
					 Present there on invitation were delegates from the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 A declaration adopted at the seminar expressed invariable support and solidarity to the indefatigable struggle of the army and people of the DPRK standing against the U.S. threat of aggression, and called for rendering material aid and moral support to the work for recovering from the flood damage in the northern part of North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.

articles.title: WFTU Congress Supports Independent Reunification of Korea
articles.content:
WFTU Congress Supports Independent Reunification of Korea
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The 17th Congress of the World Federation of Trade Unions (WFTU) adopted a solidarity resolution supporting the independent reunification of Korea. It took place in Durban of South Africa from Oct. 5 to 7.
					 The resolution said:
					
					 Korea is one.
					
					 Korea should be reunified by the Korean nation itself at the will and in line with the demand common to the nation. This is the common desire and aspiration of not only the Korean nation but also world progressives.
					
					 Reunification only can provide the Korean workers and other broad masses with genuine peace, happy life, independent development and prosperity.
					
					 The three principles of national reunification-- independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--jointly agreed by the north and south of Korea, the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation serve as the three charters for national reunification, the June 15 joint declaration the keynote of which is the idea of By Our Nation Itself is a historic landmark for the independent reunification and the October 4 declaration is a programme for implementing it.
					
					 In solidarity and alliance with progressive trade organizations of the world and international organizations, the WFTU will stage a series of protest actions of diverse forms in succession to put pressure on the U.S. to clearly understand the strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times and drop its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty and withdraw all its aggression troops and war equipment including nuclear weapons from south Korea.
					
					 It strongly demands the south Korean authorities stop all reckless politically motivated military provocations and war drills against the fellow countrymen in the north which are in pursuance of the U.S. policy and are imperiling the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It expresses solidarity with the workers and other people of the DPRK in their efforts to ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and reunify the country by a federal formula under the uplifted banner of national independence and great national unity, ardently calling on trade union organizations of all countries and international bodies to extend support and encouragement to the just struggle of General Federation Trade Unions of Korea in the future, too.

articles.title: Tennis Event Popular among DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Tennis Event Popular among DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Tennis has become popular in the DPRK with its contest among officials of commissions, ministries and national institutions in September as an occasion.
					 The first place in the contest was taken by the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					 In this regard, Choe Yong Nam, head of a department of the ministry, told KCNA:
					
					 Tennis is good for relieving fatigue and enhancing the working ability.
					
					 The ministry has paid big efforts to the tennis event under the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of making tennis a part of everyday life.
					
					 We will as ever take the lead in stirring up sports enthusiasm across the country.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Formation of DIU
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Formation of DIU
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday to mark the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism (DIU), the Juche-type revolutionary organization formed by President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The President formed the DIU, the new-type vanguard organization, on October 17, Juche 15 (1926) with the grandiose plan to carve out a new road of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Attending the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of institutions, factories and enterprises, labor innovators and bereaved families of the revolutionary martyrs here.
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in his report said that the formation of the DIU was a historic declaration that meant the solemn start of the revolutionary cause of Juche and an event which brought the fundamental turn in carving out the nation's destiny. 
					
					 With the formation of the DIU, the Korean people's revolutionary struggle greeted a new era of history as it became possible to victoriously advance despite all old trend of thought including flunkeyism and dogmatism, by relying on the strength of the nation itself guided by the most correct revolutionary line and strategic and tactics, he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean revolution originated from the DIU has firmly preserved the bloodline of Juche and advanced along the road of victory despite difficult hardships under the outstanding and tested leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The President acquired a deep insight into the aspiration in the era of independence, founded the immortal Juche idea, brightly indicated the road of the revolution and led to a steady surge the overall Korean revolution centered on the armed struggle under the banner of Juche and thus, successfully realizing the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il put forward the tradition of the DIU as the lifeline of the Party and the revolution and carried out the overall work the way the President did, based on his idea and line.
					
					 For the first time in history Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il set forth the revolutionary line of independence that independence is the life and soul of the country and the nation and the revolution of one's own country should be made with one's own efforts and the strategic slogan on living our own way, and thoroughly embodied them in the whole course of the revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The transparent faith and pluck of independence kept by the great leaders serve as the soul of the nation and treasured sword that help carve out the destiny. This enabled the Korean people to produce the proud history of victory and prosperity by their own efforts their own way, while constantly establishing the independent stand despite such grime hardships as arduous march and world political upheaval.
					
					 The party building and revolutionary cause of Juche started from the DIU has now greeted the era of the great inheritance and turn under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Victory and glory are always in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK successfully carrying forward the tradition and cause of the DIU under the ever-victorious leadership of the great Party, the reporter said, calling upon all Koreans to carry on a dynamic struggle to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started from the DIU, rallied close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Diagnoses S. Korean Foreign Minister's Illness as "Mad Condition"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Diagnoses S. Korean Foreign Minister's Illness as "Mad Condition"
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says that a confrontational maniac and strange bete noire is psychopath Yun Pyong Se, minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, just like Park Geun Hye who is notorious as a mad woman for escalating confrontation with compatriots in the north. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 Yun Pyong Se and "mad condition" are synonyms.
					
					 The most typical condition of a disease of "mad condition" is an extreme confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 He hurts the DPRK's legitimate nuclear weapons possession in his desperate efforts to foster international cooperation to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The "mad condition" is also manifested in doing harm to the DPRK's dignity and social system while vociferating about the non-existent "human rights in the north".
					
					 Now that the U.S. and its followers' racket to put sanctions upon the DPRK proved ineffective and to be unable to prevent the DPRK from bolstering its nuclear force, traitor Yun has gotten frantic to tarnish the image of the DPRK through tricky "human rights" fabrication, while asserting that "the north's nuclear issue can not be dealt being separated from the issue of 'human rights in the north'" and "comprehensive approach is required in order to solve such a difficult problem as the north's nukes".
					
					 Another symptom of the "mad condition" is a reckless warlike act and deep-rooted sycophantic and treacherous act backed by the call for the "military counteraction" against the DPRK.
					
					 War outcries made by Yun as foreign minister only leave even the puppet military warmongers perplexed.
					
					 The "mad condition" is also expressed in blind servility to the Chongwadae witch.
					
					 The article calls for mercilessly burying Yun, confrontational maniac, traitor and bete noire together with Chongwadae witch.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of October Resistance for Democracy in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Marks Anniversary of October Resistance for Democracy in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates an article to the 37th anniversary of the October Resistance for Democracy in south Korea.
					 It says:
					
					 The flames of the resistance, which started from the anti-regime demonstration of students of Pusan University for its freedom on Oct. 16, 1979, rapidly spread to different parts of south Korea including Masan, Seoul, Taegu, Chongju and Jinju.
					
					 The resistance fighters waged unyielding and determined struggles, chanting slogans calling for the repeal of "yusin constitution" and the resignation of the dictatorial regime and the freedom of speech and campus despite the brutal suppression of the resistance by heavily armed police and servicemen of the puppet army.
					
					 The October resistance clearly showed that no barbarous dictatorship can match the people rising in the struggle for justice and that the unpopular group of traitors is sure to meet its disgraceful end.
					
					 It has been scores of years since the resistance for democracy, but the desire of the fighters has not been fulfilled.
					
					 It is because of the evil rule of the puppet regime hell-bent on acts of treachery with the backing of foreign forces.
					
					 Sycophantic and treacherous politics, fascist dictatorship and anti-reunification confrontational moves by the south Korean puppet forces are a main stumbling block to independence, democracy and reunification all the people desire.
					
					 Especially since the traitor Park Geun Hye came to power, the U.S. colonial rule over south Korea has been ever more intensified, even the elementary democratic freedom and vital rights of the south Korean people have been trampled down while the "yusin" dictatorship is being revived, and the inter-Korean ties have been brought to the lowest ebb.
					
					 The realities of the prevailing situation in south Korea appeal to its people to wage a more dynamic mass struggle to put an end to the rule of the Park group of traitors in the same spirit and stamina as displayed by the resistance fighters.

articles.title: U.S.-Japan Alliance Is One for Aggression and War: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S.-Japan Alliance Is One for Aggression and War: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Harris, commander-in-chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific, at the recent talks with Japanese Defense Minister Inada said that the U.S.-Japanese relations are a basis of peace and prosperity in the Asia-Pacific region. Echoing Harris' remarks, Inada parroted that Japan-U.S. relations of trust are strong and Japan wishes to build close relations with the U.S. forces.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday terms it a gangster-like logic making profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					 The intensified U.S.-Japan alliance is a basic factor rendering the situation in the Asia-Pacific region more unstable, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Though the U.S. has to decrease the military spending due to its serious economic crisis, it is working hard to fan Japan's militarization in a bid to use it as a shock brigade and hold a military edge in Asia.
					
					 Japan is also seeking a sinister intention by calling for intensifying the U.S.-Japan alliance.
					
					 The structure of confrontation in the region has taken more concrete shape and a dark cloud of a new arms race and military conflict is hanging heavily owing to the U.S. policy of aggression and war and Japan's policy of kowtowing to the U.S. The Korean peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region and, furthermore, the world are on the threshold of a nuclear war.
					
					 In a conclusion, the U.S.-Japan alliance being tightened, emitting powder smell under the deceptive pretext of "security" is one for aggression and war bringing disaster only.
					
					 The U.S. and Japan are describing the U.S.-Japan alliance, the dangerous hotbed of war in the region, as "basis of peace and prosperity" and trumpeting about its justification in a bid to divert elsewhere the attention of the international public focused on them and justify their moves for aggression and war which envisages using the world as a theatre.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Solicitation Farce against DPRK Derided
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Solicitation Farce against DPRK Derided
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Foreign Minister Yun Pyong Se, puppet Unification Minister Hong Yong Phyo and Vice-Minister Kim Hyong Sok begged the U.S. ambassador at the U.N. who visited south Korea to "discuss" a "new resolution on 'sanctions on the north'" and "ways for improving 'human rights' of citizens in the north" allegedly to cope with the "nuclear situation in the north".
					 Puppet Prime Minister Hwang Kyo An also solicited for "sanctions on the north", "international cooperation" and "positive cooperation" while citing "nuclear issue of the north".
					
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary says this only proves the true colors of the wicked confrontation maniacs keen on stifling the DPRK even with the help of outsiders, and poor colonial stooges who zealously serve their American master.
					
					 The despicable act of the puppet forces is nothing but a foolish and desperate wriggling of living corpses seeking a way-out with the backing of the U.S., the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 But the Park Geun Hye group of traitors should know that the U.S. whom it serves with all devotion is in constant fear and seeks a way-out in the face of a series of the measures taken in succession by the DPRK to bolster its nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The Park group's mendicant solicitation to win favor of the U.S. ambassador and improve its poor plight even a bit will only precipitate their miserable ruin as it is just a useless last-ditch effort.
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet group may try, it can never weaken the DPRK's legitimate nuclear deterrence for self-defence and tarnish its dignified image.

articles.title: Revulsion at Park Geun Hye Reaches Extreme Phase
articles.content:
Revulsion at Park Geun Hye Reaches Extreme Phase
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Revulsion at Park Geun Hye has reached an extreme phase among south Korean people, according to a report.
					 As a result of an opinion poll conducted by a relevant institution in south Korea among at least 1,000 people of all social standings from Oct. 11 to 13, the support rate for Park has continued decreasing.
					
					 And the support rate for the ruling "Saenuri Party" also showed a decrease of two percent within one week.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Failure in Anti-DPRK Policy Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Failure in Anti-DPRK Policy Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Influential lawmakers from the ruling and opposition parties of south Korea at a parliamentary inspection of the administration on Oct. 13 accused the Park Geun Hye group of its failure in the policy of escalating the confrontation with the DPRK, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The former representative of the "Saenuri Party" said "it seems clear that the capability of the north's nuclear weapons is nearing the stage of completion", adding while the north is increasing the nuclear capability, south Korea ended in failure no matter whatever measure it took.
					
					 He noted that Park Geun Hye's policies of escalating confrontation with the north including "confidence-building process" came to naught.
					
					 The representative of the Minju Party said that when the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes pursued harsh policies, the north put its nuclear capability on a high level.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by South African Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by South African Body
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website the full text of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The work, published on Oct. 10, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies the idea that the history of the WPK is the proud course in which it took care of the people's destiny in a responsible manner and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK October Holidays Celebrated in DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK October Holidays Celebrated in DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Friendship meetings, book and photo exhibitions, round-table talks and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Russia, India, Equatorial Guinea and Angola on Oct. 3 and 7 to mark the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books and photos introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length pictures of the great leaders standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un", "Monument to Party Founding" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 and developed it into the party of the working masses. The WPK is leading the Korean people's drive for building a socialist power to victory, he added.
					
					 The first deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea noted that the great feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the building of the revolutionary party of Juche, anti-imperialist national liberation struggle, national reunification and the cause of human independence are still remembered by the people of Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Committee for External Affairs of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Lao-DPRK Friendship Association, the Venezuelan Embassy in Beijing and different units of China sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions in relevant countries.

articles.title: Nepalese Paper Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Nepalese Paper Praises DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Nepalese paper carried an article "The DPRK, socialist country" contributed by its editor Ashok Prasad Subedi who had paid a visit to the DPRK.
					 The article said it is just the DPRK that is firmly protecting socialism, regarding it as its lifeline in the face of the hideous sanctions and blockade of the imperialist allied forces, adding:
					
					 At the end of the last century when socialist countries in East Europe collapsed one after another, the DPRK alone didn't lose its powerful looks but reliably defended the system in which the people became masters.
					
					 The DPRK is dearly kept in the hearts of the world people and they are eager to visit it as it has inflicted only defeat and fear upon the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Shortly ago, the DPRK succeeded in the nuclear warhead explosion test, which became a common auspicious event of the progressives loving justice and peace, to say nothing of Koreans. It was like a dirk planted into the heart of the U.S.
					
					 During my visit, I keenly realized once again that thanks to the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, a large contingent of revolutionaries and patriots has been built and the DPRK made a leap forward and thanks to Comrade Kim Jong Un the future of the DPRK is rosier.
					
					 The paper carried photos showing the military parade and public procession of Pyongyangites held in celebration of the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK making a leaping progress.

articles.title: Tiene lugar el acto central por el 90o aniversario de constitucion de la UDI
articles.content:
Tiene lugar el acto central por el 90o aniversario de constitucion de la UDI
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 90o aniversario de la constitucion de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo (UDI), organizacion revolucionaria de tipo jucheano.
					Con el gran proposito de allanar el nuevo camino de la Revolucion Coreana, el Presidente Kim Il Sung constituyo el 17 de octubre del 15 (1926) de la Era Juche esa organizacion vanguardista de nuevo tipo.
					
					Asistieron al acto Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion central del Partido en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de organismos del Partido, fuerzas armadas y Poder, entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los otros de instituciones, fabricas y empresas de esta capital, los innovadores laborales y los familiares de martires revolucionarios.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC.
					
					La constitucion de la UDI fue la declaracion historica del inicio de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y un evento que trajo cambio radical en la forja del destino de la nacion, comenzo el orador y continuo:
					
					Gracias al nacimiento de la UDI, la lucha revolucionaria del pueblo coreano acogio la nueva epoca de la historia en que se desarrolla victoriosamente con las fuerzas propias de la nacion separandose del servilismo a grandes potencias, el dogmatismo y otras tendencias ideologicas caducas y teniendo la mas correcta linea, estrategia y tacticas sobre la revolucion.
					
					La revolucion coreana, que partio de la UDI, mantiene firmemente el linaje del Juche y avanza por el unico camino de victorias superando multiples pruebas bajo la destacada y probada orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Percatado de la aspiracion de la epoca de independencia, el Presidente creo la imperecedera idea Juche con que ilumino el futuro camino de la revolucion. Y bajo la bandera del Juche, cumplio la historica causa de liberacion de la patria al conducir al auge incesante la revolucion coreana en general, centrada en la lucha armada.
					
					El Dirigente presento la tradicion de la UDI como linea vital del partido y la revolucion y desarrollo todas las labores por el estilo del Presidente y a base de su idea y linea.
					
					Por primera vez en la historia, los grandes Lideres presentaron la linea revolucionaria de que la independencia es la vida del pais y la nacion y la revolucion de cada pais debe realizarse con las fuerzas propias, y la consigna estrategica de vivir por el estilo coreano y las materializaron consecuentemente en todo el trayecto de la orientacion sobre la revolucion.
					
					La ferrea conviccion independiente y coraje de ellos constituyeron el espiritu de la nacion y el remedio omnipotente de la forja del destino.
					
					Asi, el pueblo coreano pudo crear la orgullosa historia de victoria y prosperidad con fuerzas propias y por su estilo sin renunciar la postura independiente aun en las pruebas tan severas como la Marcha penosa y las adversidades de la politica mundial.
					
					La causa de construccion del partido del tipo jucheano y de la revolucion, iniciada en la UDI, acoge hoy dia la era de gran continuacion y cambio bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Solo habra victorias y glorias al ejercito y pueblo coreanos que bajo la invencible orientacion del gran partido, continuan perfectamente la tradicion y la causa de la UDI.
					
					Unidos mas firmemente en torno al Mariscal, todos deben luchar vigorosamente para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche que tiene su genesis en la UDI.
